mapper.insert: insert into permission (id, permi_name, url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, permi_name, url, create_time, update_time from permission
